Notes.Text:
This update for liblouis fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-26768: Fixed buffer overflow in lou_logFile() (bsc#1209431).

Vulnerabilities.Description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability found in Liblouis v.3.24.0 allows a remote attacker to cause a denial of service via the compileTranslationTable.c and lou_setDataPath functions.
